metadata.description: **The most popular series ever introduced in the pages of Eerie!** The Rook is back! Bill DuBay's time-traveling adventure classic returns, penned and illustrated by comics masters Steven Grant (2 Guns) and Paul Gulacy (Jonah Hex)! Restin Dane is ready for actionanyplace, anytime! * He's got history in his gun sights! * The return of the internationally acclaimed Warren Publishing classic!
metadata.name: Rook
